description:
Syncing, backing up, and sharing your files in total privacy couldnâ€™t be easier.
With Internxt Drive we focus on user-friendly encrypted storage with military-grade
encryption, so only you have control over your files and data.


Fixes
* Errors while downloading and storing files
* Errors when syncing files and folders with same name
* Errors when deleting folder with items inside
* Active users tracking broken and mis-displayed on data platform
* Sync improvements and fallback mechanism
* Bug can not get remote contents
* Include states on items
* Update fully synced message if they aren't synced
